entity.name: title
entity.query: select T.title_id as title_id, T.title_ttype as ttype, T.title_views as views, T.title_annualviews as annualviews, T.title_rating as rating, IF(T.title_seriesnum IS NULL, -1, T.title_seriesnum) as seriesnum, T.title_copyright as copyright_date, T.title_storylen as storylen, T.title_translator as translator, T.title_title as imdb_url, T.title_wikipedia as wikipedia_url from titles T

entity.name: title_author
entity.query: select author_id as author_x, title_id as title_x from canonical_author where ca_status = 1

entity.name: author
entity.query: select A.author_id as author_ids, A.author_marque as author_marques, A.author_canonical as author_names, A.author_image as author_image_urls, A.author_imdb as author_imdb_urls, A.author_wikipedia as author_wikipedia_urls from authors A

entity.name: author
entity.query: select A.author_id as author_id, A.author_marque as marque, A.author_lastname as last_name, A.author_canonical as canonical_name, A.author_legalname as legal_name, A.author_birthplace as birth_place, A.author_birthdate as birth_date, A.author_deathdate as death_date, A.author_annualviews as annualviews, A.author_views as views, A.author_image as image_url, A.author_imdb as imdb_url, A.author_wikipedia as wikipedia_url from authors A

entity.name: author_webpages
entity.query: select author_id as author_x, url as webpage_urls from webpages where author_id IS NOT NULL

entity.name: author_emails
entity.query: select author_id as author_x, email_address as emails from emails where author_id IS NOT NULL and email_address IS NOT NULL
